price: 73. Waxaad ku leedihiin gudaheeda midho tiro badan, xaggeedaa wax ka cuntaan19.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: 19. Waxaa loola jeedaa wax kastoo macaan oo dhadhan fiican.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
